## ARTHStore.start() method

Start monitoring the blockchain for ARTH state changes.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
start(): () => void;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

() =&gt; void

Function to stop the monitoring.

## Remarks

The [onLoaded](./arth-base.arthstore.onloaded.md) callback will be called after the state is fetched for the first time.

Use the [subscribe()](./arth-base.arthstore.subscribe.md) function to register listeners.
